metadata.title: Device: Is there any further serial number programmed in the device, besides from the part marking?

sections.content:
Question:
Is there any further serial number programmed in the device, besides from the part marking?
Answer:
Yes. Besides from the device part number (reflecting the full device part name, including the ROM code identifying the pre-programmed firmware) there is a unique identifier programmed in the chip which is 128-bit wide. Both the unique code and part number can be queried over the device programming interface.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
